content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position(0.5, 6.0)
Consists of boiler (position 0.5, 6.0) and steam engine (position 0.5, 0.5). The boiler requires water and coal to produce steam, which powers the steam engine.

### Copper plate factory at position(-5.0, -65.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace (position -5.0, -65.0) that processes iron ore into iron plates.
- Burner mining drill (position 47.0, -82.0) that extracts iron ore from the ground.

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors related to missing inventory items
- Ensure that you have the necessary items in your inventory before attempting to place or connect entities. For example, the Offshore Pump cannot be placed as it is not in inventory. Always check your inventory before executing actions.

### Errors when connecting boiler to steam engine
- Ensure that you have pipes in your inventory to connect the Boiler to the Steam Engine. If you do not have pipes, you will not be able to establish the connection necessary for the boiler to function properly.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.
